game.title: The Chronicles of Azoria: Rise of Light
game.synopsis: Embark on an epic adventure in the fantasy world of Azoria, where darkness threatens to consume everything. As a chosen hero, you must embark on a quest to defeat Malakar, banish evil, and restore peace to your land. Gather allies, confront fearsome creatures, and unravel ancient mysteries to saveAzoria and bring light back.
game.beginning: As the last rays of sunlight fade, Azoria's fate hangs in the balance
game.ending: In a climactic climax, you emerge victorious against all odds, securing the realm's prosperity for generations to come
